title:
Group schemes over LG-rings and applications to cancellation theorems
  and Azumaya algebras
authors: Philippe Gille (ICJ, AGL, IMAR), Erhard Neher
abstract:
We prove several results on reductive group schemes over LG-rings, e.g.,
existence of maximal tori and conjugacy of parabolic subgroups. These were
proven in SGA3 for the special case of semilocal rings. We apply these results
to establish cancellation theorems for hermitian and quadratic forms over
LG-rings and show that the Brauer classes of Azumaya algebras over connected
LG-rings have a unique representative and allow Brauer decomposition.
